stepInfoFilterText: By default, the Data Explorer displays all available datasets. Use the filters at the top of the screen to narrow down your selections.
stepInfoSelectTextA: There are three ways to select data:
stepInfoSelectTextB: Creating a rectangle at any zoom level: Click and hold shift while dragging the cursor at any zoom level or use the rectangle tool (insert icon). With the tool selected, click on the map to start drawing the rectangle. Drag to the opposing corner and click again. Note that you can only have one rectangle selection active at a time.
stepInfoSelectTextC: Creating a polygon at any zoom level: For an irregular shape use the polygon tool (insert icon). With the tool selected, click on the map to start drawing the polygon. When you've finished drawing the search area, finish your search area by clicking on the first point again.
stepInfoSelectTextD: Selecting points at the points zoom level: Click any observation to directly select.
stepInfoInspectText: After making a selection, a summary of the selected dataset(s) will appear in a panel to the left. Click the table headers to sort results or search across datasets with the search. You can view each dataset in more detail by clicking on a dataset in the table.
stepInfoDownloadText: To download data, select datasets for download and then press the download button at the bottom of the page. The modal that opens allows the user to confirm their data order by verifying dataset titles, set filters on the data and the review the size of the download. If the download is too large, please download by accessing the ERDDAPâ„¢ link. Enter your email address and submit to confirm your order. An email providing the direct download link will be sent shortly.
tipInfoHoverHelpHeading: Hover over the images below for instructions on how to use the CIOOS Data Explorer.
tipInfoFeedback: Please fill out our user survey! Your feedback helps improve this interface and find bugs.
tipInfoReopen: Click the info button at the top left of the screen to reopen this information panel.
introModalWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the CIOOS Data Explorer. Use the map to search geographically for data, across supported datasets. Filter, aggregate, and download just the data that meets your criteria. Data Explorer downloads are in a standardized (.csv) format.
feedbackButtonTitle: Please provide feedback on your experience using CIOOS Data Explorer
oceanVariableFilterTooltip: Filter data by ocean variable name. Selection works as logical OR operation.
platformFilterTooltip: Filter data by platform type. Selection works as logical OR operation.
organizationFilterTooltip: Filter data by responsible organisation name. Selection works as logical OR operation.
datasetFilterTooltip: Filter data by dataset name. Selection works as logical OR operation.
timeframeFilterTooltip: Filter data by timeframe. Selection works as inclusive range.
depthrangeFilterTooltip: Filter data by depth. Selection works as inclusive range.
depthFilterStartInvalidTitle: Start depth must be less than end depth, and be 0 to 12000m.
depthFilterEndInvalidTitle: End depth must be more than start depth, and be 0 to 12000m
depthFilterInvalidWarning: Depth filter not applied, invalid values.
dateFilterInvalidWarning: Time filter not applied, invalid values.
selectionDetailsNoDataWarning: No Data. Modify filters or change selection on map.
datasetsTableHeaderLocationsTitle: Sort by number of selected locations in dataset
datasetsTableHeaderSizeTitle: Sort by approximate dataset size in megabytes
datasetsTableLocationsTitle: Ratio of selected locations from dataset
datasetInspectorClickPreviewText: Click on a record to preview the first 1000 records in a table or plot
legendNoDataWarningTitle: Choose less restrictive filters to see data
downloadDetailsDownloadDataSteps2: Ensure selections are within the 100MB limit,
downloadDetailsDownloadDataSteps3: Provide an email address to receive the download link, and,
downloadDetailsDownloadDataSteps4: Submit the download request. Filters applied in the CIOOS Data Explorer also apply to dataset downloads.
mapPointHoverTooltip: day(s) of data. Click for details
legendSectionTitleLessOneDayOfData: One day of data or less
legendSectionTitleMoreOneDayOfData: More than one day of data
filterInfoButtonTitle: Learn more about the filter here
datasetPreviewNoData: This dataset can not be previewed. Try again later
resetFiltersButtonTooltipText: Reset all filters and polygon selection to defaults
downloadDetailsFilterQuestionTooltipText: Use Time, Depth and Space filters to change dataset download sizes. Active filters are applied to all datasets in a download. Use the available ERDDAPâ„¢ links to download large datasets.
downloadDetailsNoFiltersActiveMessage: No Time, Depth, or Space filters currently active
datasetTableDownloadModalCDEDownloadable: Requests for less than 1GB of data from a dataset can be downloaded through CDE
datasetTableDownloadModalNotCDEDownloada: Requests for more than 1GB of data from a dataset can be downloaded through the provided ERDDAP link
